items.title: Disney reports surprise uptick in streaming subscribers, beats on top and bottom lines
items.content: Disney upped some of its fiscal 2025 guidance and posted revenue growth in all three of its business segments.
items.contentSnippet: Disney upped some of its fiscal 2025 guidance and posted revenue growth in all three of its business segments.

items.title: Banks are keeping credit card rates high even after the CFPB rule they blamed for high APRs was killed
items.content: Retail cards hit a record high average interest rate of 30.5% last year, and rates have stayed close to those levels this year.
items.contentSnippet: Retail cards hit a record high average interest rate of 30.5% last year, and rates have stayed close to those levels this year.

items.title: Rivian cuts 2025 delivery target, ups expected spending amid tariff pressures
items.content: Rivian's new guidance includes deliveries of between 40,000 units and 46,000 units, and expenditures of between $1.8 billion and $1.9 billion.
items.contentSnippet: Rivian's new guidance includes deliveries of between 40,000 units and 46,000 units, and expenditures of between $1.8 billion and $1.9 billion.

items.title: Mattel CEO says toy manufacturing won't come to America, but price hikes will
items.content: Mattel CEO Ynon Kreiz says toy manufacturing will not come to America, but price increases will.
items.contentSnippet: Mattel CEO Ynon Kreiz says toy manufacturing will not come to America, but price increases will.

items.title: Comcast's cable spinoff to be named Versant, picked to emphasize corporate versatility
items.content: Comcast's SpinCo, which will include USA, MSNBC, CNBC and E!, will be renamed Versant to emphasize corporate versatility and adaptability, the company said.
items.contentSnippet: Comcast's SpinCo, which will include USA, MSNBC, CNBC and E!, will be renamed Versant to emphasize corporate versatility and adaptability, the company said.

items.title: Hispanic shoppers are spending less on groceries, putting pressure on consumer companies
items.content: Coca-Cola, Constellation Brands and Colgate-Palmolive reported that Hispanic consumers are spending less, which weighed on their North American sales.
items.contentSnippet: Coca-Cola, Constellation Brands and Colgate-Palmolive reported that Hispanic consumers are spending less, which weighed on their North American sales.

items.title: Former LPGA golfer Michelle Wie West invests in women's sports company Togethxr
items.content: CNBC caught up with former LPGA star Michelle Wie-West about retirement and her passion for pushing women's sports forward.
items.contentSnippet: CNBC caught up with former LPGA star Michelle Wie-West about retirement and her passion for pushing women's sports forward.

items.title: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile takes over naming rights of Philadelphia arena
items.content: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile will become the new name of the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, which is home to the NHL's Flyers and NBA's 76ers.
items.contentSnippet: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile will become the new name of the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, which is home to the NHL's Flyers and NBA's 76ers.

items.title: Luxury carmaker Ferrari warns of U.S. tariff risks after 17% jump in first-quarter profit
items.content: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in first-quarter profit, citing robust demand for personalized vehicles.
items.contentSnippet: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in first-quarter profit, citing robust demand for personalized vehicles.

items.title: Ford suspends 2025 guidance amid $2.5 billion tariff impact
items.content: Ford Motor beat Wall Street's first-quarter expectations, but suspended its 2025 financial guidance amid an expected $2.5 billion impact this year from tariffs.
items.contentSnippet: Ford Motor beat Wall Street's first-quarter expectations, but suspended its 2025 financial guidance amid an expected $2.5 billion impact this year from tariffs.

items.title: Trump signs order to boost domestic drug manufacturing as pharma tariffs loom
items.content: The order comes ahead of Trump's planned tariffs on pharmaceuticals imported into the U.S.
items.contentSnippet: The order comes ahead of Trump's planned tariffs on pharmaceuticals imported into the U.S.

items.title: Newark air traffic controllers couldn't see or talk to planes, leading to last week's airport meltdown
items.content: The FAA said air traffic controllers took time off to recover from the stress of the event.
items.contentSnippet: The FAA said air traffic controllers took time off to recover from the stress of the event.

items.title: FanDuel Sports Network touts streaming subscriber growth for regional games
items.content: FanDuel Sports Network, the company behind regional channels for 30 NBA, NHL and MLB teams, now counts 650,000 paid streaming subscribers.
items.contentSnippet: FanDuel Sports Network, the company behind regional channels for 30 NBA, NHL and MLB teams, now counts 650,000 paid streaming subscribers.

items.title: Skechers to be acquired by 3G Capital in take-private deal, shares soar 24%
items.content: Footwear giant Skechers will be acquired by 3G Capital for $63 per share, a 30% premium to its current valuation on the public markets.
items.contentSnippet: Footwear giant Skechers will be acquired by 3G Capital for $63 per share, a 30% premium to its current valuation on the public markets.

items.title: Hollywood studio stocks briefly fall after Trump proposes foreign film tariff
items.content: Shares of Netflix, Disney, WBD, Paramount and Comcast fell after President Donald Trump proposed a tariff on films shot outside the U.S.
items.contentSnippet: Shares of Netflix, Disney, WBD, Paramount and Comcast fell after President Donald Trump proposed a tariff on films shot outside the U.S.

items.title: Inside GM’s decade-long battle to revive Cadillac as the quintessential American luxury car brand
items.content: Here's how the brand is trying to get its portfolio back into shape and boost its status in the competitive luxury vehicle market.
items.contentSnippet: Here's how the brand is trying to get its portfolio back into shape and boost its status in the competitive luxury vehicle market.

items.title: MLS sponsorships spike as U.S. soccer gains popularity
items.content: The addition of soccer superstar Lionel Messi has helped boost the league, and the upcoming 2026 World Cup is expected to give a lift to fandom in the U.S.
items.contentSnippet: The addition of soccer superstar Lionel Messi has helped boost the league, and the upcoming 2026 World Cup is expected to give a lift to fandom in the U.S.

items.title: MLS signs a deal with EA to stream four soccer matches on mobile gaming platform
items.content: MLS games will be offered on EA's mobile platform in the coming months, as the U.S.' top soccer league looks to expand its audience.
items.contentSnippet: MLS games will be offered on EA's mobile platform in the coming months, as the U.S.' top soccer league looks to expand its audience.

items.title: 'Dumpster fire': Retailers urge shoppers to buy now before tariffs raise prices
items.content: Retailers contending with the effects tariffs will have on their businesses are urging consumers to buy now in a bid to boost sales before spending drops.
items.contentSnippet: Retailers contending with the effects tariffs will have on their businesses are urging consumers to buy now in a bid to boost sales before spending drops.

items.title: Trump's China tariffs are raising costs for wedding dresses and threatening the small shops that sell them
items.content: The higher duties on bridal gowns and special occasion dresses have raised costs for boutiques and designers across the country.
items.contentSnippet: The higher duties on bridal gowns and special occasion dresses have raised costs for boutiques and designers across the country.

items.title: United cuts Newark schedule after hundreds of flight disruptions, blaming FAA staffing, technology problems
items.content: United Airlines said FAA staffing and technology problems have contributed to hundreds of flight delays this week.

items.title: Netflix stock is trading at all-time-high levels in unprecedented win streak
items.content: Netflix's stock has traded for 11 straight days without a decline, the company's longest positive run ever.
items.contentSnippet: Netflix's stock has traded for 11 straight days without a decline, the company's longest positive run ever.

items.title: Footwear giants Nike, Adidas and others ask Trump for tariff exemption
items.content: Nike, Adidas and Skechers co-signed a footwear industry letter to President Donald Trump this week asking him to exempt shoes from his broad tariffs.
items.contentSnippet: Nike, Adidas and Skechers co-signed a footwear industry letter to President Donald Trump this week asking him to exempt shoes from his broad tariffs.

items.title: Churchill Downs CEO says interest in the Kentucky Derby is strong despite global uncertainty

items.title: Amazon is stepping up to fill a gap in Hollywood's movie slate

items.title: Automakers report significant April sales increases amid tariff fear-buying, but the good times may not last

items.title: GM lowers 2025 guidance, citing up to $5 billion in tariff exposure
items.content: GM on Thursday lowered its 2025 earnings guidance to include a possible $4 billion to $5 billion impact as a result of President Donald Trump's auto tariffs.
